TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定伺服器控制項在它的建構函數 (Constructor) 內需要的標記名稱。

span.span: Specifies that a server control needs a tag name in its constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需背景資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For background information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute_Sample1/CS/ctorneedstagattr_1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute_Sample1/VB/ctorneedstagattr_1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立簡單的自訂控制項的標記名稱在執行階段定義。The following code example creates a simple custom control whose tag name is defined at run time. 以下是用來建置可執行檔的命令列。The following is the command line used to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/vb_myconstructorNeedsTagAtt.dll constructNeedsTagAtt.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/cs_myConstructorNeedsTagAtt.dll constructorNeedsTagAtt.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute/CS/constructorneedstagatt.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ConstructorNeedsTagAttribute/VB/constructorneedstagatt.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會使用先前的自訂控制項。The following code example uses the previous custom control. 請注意，中顯示的值`Register`指示詞反映上一個命令列。Notice that the values shown in the `Register` directive reflect the previous command line. ```vb <%@ Register TagPrefix='MyCurrentUserControl' Namespace='MyUserControl' Assembly='vb_myConstructorNeedsTagAtt'%>
``` ```csharp <%@ Register TagPrefix='MyCurrentUserControl' Namespace='MyUserControl' Assembly='cs_myConstructorNeedsTagAtt'%>
```
